original_text: If that happens, the Lord will send you away to live among many other nations, all over the world. There you will worship other gods. They are gods that people have made from wood and from stone. Neither you nor your ancestors have ever known those gods before.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너를 땅 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 만민 중에 흩으시리니 네가 그 곳에서 너와 네 조상들이 알지 못하던 목석 우상을 섬길 것이라

sentences.original_text: the Lord will send you away
to live among many other nations
There you will worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 당신은 다른 신들을 경배하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They are gods that people have made
have ever known those gods before
sentences.korean_translation: 그전에 결코 그 신들을 알지 못했습니다
